title: Implement derivatives for all point-wise operaters
body_html:
Point-wise operators are those that are considered fusible by the JIT.

Why? We can't do most optimizations for operators without derivatives and shape analysis, but by implementing just these operators, we enable most things to work.

What are point-wise?
torch/csrc/jit/passes/graph_fuser.cpp

Where are derivative patterns added?
torch/csrc/jit/autodiff.cpp

How do I test this?
testADFormulas in torch/csrc/jit/test_jit.cpp

body:
Point-wise operators are those that are considered fusible by the JIT.

Why? We can't do most optimizations for operators without derivatives and shape analysis, but by implementing just these operators, we enable most things to work.

What are point-wise?
torch/csrc/jit/passes/graph_fuser.cpp

Where are derivative patterns added?
torch/csrc/jit/autodiff.cpp

How do I test this?
testADFormulas in torch/csrc/jit/test_jit.cpp
